title: moreron
author: moreron
created_time: October 27, 2022, 03:03:11 PMLast edit: November 10, 2024, 01:00:50 AM by moreron

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Maybe include some details about the project of discussion so that contributors can have background knowledge of the project. After a quick google search, I found this Gempad App project, and from what I see, it is a launchpad project on bsc already has some project to launch. Launchpad projects are good if they have good and genuine projects launching in the platform and with this current bear market not many projects are going into launching and those who launched are struggling with price.  If you are interested in this project, you should do more research, don't invest because it is a launchpad project.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: moreron on October 27, 2022, 03:03:11 PMJust simply want to start a discussion about Gempad. I am curious of what people thinkLike the other guy already said it is hard to give an opinion about a project where we have zero information about. I also just did a little google search and it seems like the website of this project is gempad.app apparently. I took a quick look at the projects that were offered there and i have to say that i don't know any of those projects and there are also quite a lot meme-coins among them. For me meme-coins are useless shit-coins so i am not impressed by that portfolio.That being said i am part of some other launchpads (DuckDao and Poolz) and there it is also pretty quiet at the moment. There are just not so many projects launching during a bear market.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: moreron on October 27, 2022, 03:03:11 PMJust simply want to start a discussion about Gempad. I am curious of what people thinkIf you ask me what i think about a Token like GemPad i could say it sucks. It doesn't have a page web or active social networks or at least some market transactions... I was just a token generated with an smart contract and the project was forgotten in the limbo. I would recommend to stay away from tokens like this if or other way you can lose money with them.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: I don't like these launchpads anymore there was a time when they are very popular launch platforms for many play-to-earn projects this is where I got 4 of my Play to earn tokens, unfortunately, these launchpads are not reliable for picking good projects, I lost 90% of my investment from these Play To Earn to these launchpads and checking all the other projects on launchpad they lived on hype, they do not screen these projects they just keep accepting them because they also make profit from these projects.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: I'm just hearing about this project for the first time and I've checked the project out, I am surprised that a launchpad still have some new projects running on its platform right now, I am a fan of seedify and makerDAO because they don't introduce crap projects, they are better than Gempad, liquidity and volume wise Gempad has failed.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: Quote from: moreron on October 27, 2022, 03:03:11 PMJust simply want to start a discussion about Gempad. I am curious of what people thinkI went to their website and saw that the 5 project's token sale is upcoming. When I saw the Twitter of one of these projects, that project had only 36 followers. LOL Usually, whenever you see a project which is going to be launched for token sale on an IDO platform they have thousands of Twitter followers and similarly on other social media platforms. (means a strong community) But I was surprised by what this platform is bringing for their investors. Projects that no one knows about. Having no community support.Here is the project that i am talking about: https://mobile.twitter.com/zahnymous

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Typical project launchpad platform. During the bull market there are plenty of ido platform that launches new tokenized projects. But this gempad is not unique at all to those. Ive saw their platform and its nothing special. They have some project line up, but you could check whether those on their roster will survive for long term and to my surprises some are really not worth it.In launching an ido platform make sure that your line up projects are the best so your platform could be a strong one and a top choice. But not sure how gempad would expand like this.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on October 28, 2022, 09:54:16 AMIn launching an ido platform make sure that your line up projects are the best so your platform could be a strong one and a top choice. But not sure how gempad would expand like this. Right now the market is affecting a lot of projects that wants to launch hence most launchpad are finding it difficult to survive. Launchpad project depends on the projects that launch on their platform to survive. And this not a strong utility base for any project who consider the survival and long term existence of its project. It is better to diversify into other trends as a launchpad project to keep the project alive in during the bear market otherwise being strictly a launchpad project can be difficult especially during periods like this.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on October 28, 2022, 03:31:47 PMIt is better to diversify into other trends as a launchpad project to keep the project alive in during the bear market otherwise being strictly a launchpad project can be difficult especially during periods like this.  Yes like my launchpad platform on avalaunch(avax network). They just probably launching one for 2 months or more since then. Especially with the current situation they cant afford to lose reputation on choosing ablot of project with ending up dead in the water.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: moreron on October 27, 2022, 03:03:11 PMJust simply want to start a discussion about Gempad. I am curious of what people thinkI don't know about gempad but I did my own little research about it. And I can say that, this is a composition of many projects and a list for all of it. It's like ICO lists and I've looked at their maximum contribution and some are having a lot of cap for those interested investors. But this is like a gamble, so high risk and high reward for the listed projects there.If the chosen one becomes successful, you're lucky enough to be rewarded with how much you invested there.

comments.author: mihir

After some days my Private sales they are being removedSupport name by Niall who's trying fix their problem tokenomics calculating on Gamepad but his nothing fixed and my presale  have removed in resultafter awhile I come back on gamepad and ask support to recovery my private sale because i spend 0.1 ethy for this and get nothingThey told me that i must payed again 0.1 eth for this and they compensate to me my last private sales creating - given GOLD tier and Audit service for FreeI was agreeIn result i am waiting for two weeks and get nothing They Little scammers again ask me make payment for Audit service and Gold tier 0.2 ethBlocking me in they TG Channel and refuse refund my fundsMore over i am strongly not recommended creating your Privatsale because you will not get any users toyour project, thisplatform is empty. There is nobody there. Your just spend your ETH or BTC in the sky which you can spand on marketing"They told me -What seems to be the problem here?Chill it with the attitude, Niall 100% didn't do anything wrong here."Yes they just Liars and  little scammers which does luring you money outToday i ask refund my ETH and they refuse make it want more 0.1 ETH for relisting they scammers platform which they ask for your eth and do nothing
